text: Jolán Kleiber-Kontsek (née Kontsek; 29 August 1939 – 20 July 2022) was a Hungarian athlete. He mainly competed in the discus throw event during her career. She won a bronze medal at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Kleiber-Kontsek was born in Budapest, Hungary. Kleiber-Kontsek died in Budapest on 20 July 2022 at the age of 82.Jolán Kleiber-Kontsek ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian athletes Category:Discus throwers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Jolán Kleiber-Kontsek
